Exchange Regulatory Improvement Act of 2023
To amend the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to revise the definition of a facility.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

bill.summary:
Exchange Regulatory Improvement Act of 2023
This bill revises the definition of facility for purposes of regulation under the Securities Exchange Act of 1934. Specifically, the bill provides that a facility does not include any property, premises, or service that can legally be offered by a person or entity that is not required to be registered as an exchange.
